description: This file defines data models for a media processing application, including classes for users, assets, transcripts, quotes, and export jobs, utilizing Pydantic for data validation and serialization.

classes.name: AssetType
classes.description: Enumeration of media asset types such as audio, video, or unknown.

classes.name: JobStatus
classes.description: Enumeration of job processing statuses like pending, processing, completed, failed, or canceled.

classes.name: User
classes.description: Represents a basic user profile with ID, email, and optional display name.

classes.name: Asset
classes.description: Represents an uploaded media asset with metadata such as filename, content type, size, URL, and owner.

classes.name: TranscriptSegment
classes.description: Defines a segment within a transcript with start/end times, text, and optional speaker label.

classes.name: Transcript
classes.description: Contains transcript data linked to an asset, including language, full text, segments, and processing status.

classes.name: Quote
classes.description: Represents an extracted quote from a transcript, with timing, confidence, approval status, and tags.

classes.name: ExportFormat
classes.description: Enumeration of supported export formats such as plain text, JSON, SRT, VTT, and social media formats.

classes.name: ExportJob
classes.description: Models an export request, including quote IDs, format, status, result URL, and error messages.

methods.name: datetime.utcnow
methods.description: Returns the current UTC date and time.
